thread.title: Marilyn

author: Marilyn
title: Marilyn
text: I rang Uttings and talked to them about my requirement for a wildlife camera to record hedgehog activity in my garden. They endorsed my choice, I ordered from them and the camera was delivered promptly and securely packaged. The Bushnell Wildlife camera records everything I wanted it to record. Just remember you have no idea what happens in your garden at night until you have a camera. Its brilliant!
